entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this evening then northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 08 February 2023
